post.body: Haven't heard anything bout AV whacking product lines. bkatz@avaya.com
I meant .. phenomenal content or phenomenally entertaining.
what did disney have 2 say?
willing to help w cms. bkatz@avaya.com
don't know what this is in reference to, but would be glad to track it down ... bkatz@avaya.com
I don't know about the EC2 guide ... what is it? I could help track down interest... bkatz@avaya.com
IM seems central. SMS important - particularly outside US. As for 'must' ... depends on time frame & customer goal
anything I can help with? bkatz@avaya.com
eliminate? I empathize. But in the mean time, interested in making it more useful? Can provide ideas. bkatz@avaya.com
eliminate? I empathize. But in the mean time, interested in making it more useful? Can provide ideas. bkatz@avaya.com
4th cup of espresso 2day
Had to uninstall IE8. Strange I/O problem across many AJAX web sites. Couldn't enter anything from keyboard.
Nuance Speech rec lists for $99 - unless you want to use speech for Outlook, then it's $900.
finally loaded latest IE - IE8. Faster but still does things to my pc that it shouldn't. Weird command line pop-ups during install.
Tried out X1. Performance hit not worth it. Thunderbird for email is a good enough search tool 4 me. No performance issues.
power outage in central joisey
same as PDC
After 2 days in Redmond, everything looks azure to me.... or will be
Redmond ... MSFT portfolio briefing ...
Dynamism http://www.dynamism.com opened a new high tech toy store. Latest tech from Japan - gizmine: http://www.gizmine.com/
installing 11/25 alpha version of thunderbird (shredder)
v.o.
Top news reports from the onion http://www.theonion.com are blocked by through our firewall :-/
bizweek says pc's like my tiny VYE might become the big thing in 2009 - if Apple jumps in. http://www.vyepc.com Love it.
love/hate r'ship with business week. Love 2 read it. Hate being reminded of business early on a sunday morn.
yammer. (sigh). How can it be a corporate tool without absolute guaranteed crystal clarity on security? Askin' for a learnin'...
voice 2.0? a tired term for struggling mag? http://tinyurl.com/5cdfuk
apparently, 2day is nat'l drive-like-an-idiot day. missed the announcement.
